contents.text: Thank you for calling Algolia in San Francisco, the leading hosted search API provider connecting your users with lightning-fast, highly relevant results.
For Sales, Pricing, and Account Inquiries, press 1.
To speak with a Sales representative, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you to a Sales representative.

navigationGoals: Get a fast quote on enterprise pricing and contract terms for a larger usage plan.
Ask a sales rep about startup pricing and veteran-owned business discounts
Obtain an enterprise pricing breakdown for handling ~1 M QPS search traffic.
I need help understanding the subscription options and signing up.
I’d like to discuss academic pricing options for using Algolia in my physics research project.

contents.text: For Billing and Account Management, press 2.
Please hold while we connect you to our Billing team.

navigationGoals: Review my most recent invoice charges and update the payment method on file.
Resolve an unexpected charge and update my billing information
Download my latest billing invoice PDF and update the corporate credit card on file.
I'd like to review and settle my invoice.
I need help resolving a billing discrepancy on my student account’s latest invoice.

contents.text: For Technical Support and Developer Assistance, press 2.
Please hold while we connect you to Technical Support.

navigationGoals: Resolve a critical production search API error that’s impacting our live site.
Get help troubleshooting authentication errors in my API calls
Troubleshoot intermittent 429 rate-limit errors and latency spikes in my search API integration.
My website's search isn't working; I need help troubleshooting.
I’m encountering API timeouts when running batch queries for my simulation data and need technical support.

contents.text: For Developer Resources and API Documentation, press 2.
Please hold while we connect you to our Developer Resources team.

navigationGoals: Locate code samples and documentation for integrating Algolia’s instant search in our React app.
Find code samples and documentation for implementing an autocomplete widget
Locate the JavaScript client docs for implementing faceted search and custom pagination.
I want to learn how to integrate the search API from your documentation.
I’m looking for Python SDK examples to integrate Algolia search into my research database.
